item.title: Subscribe
item.description:
To stay up to date with the latest news and updates from this blog, you can subscribe in various ways:

Substack

To get posts and updates from this blog via email you can subscribe to Adi Polak Data & Open Source Updates here. No ads or spam; I’m not too fond of that stuff myself.

Linkedin

Catch-up on what I am up to over Linkedin.

YouTube

You can subscribe to the YouTube channel of Adi Polak.
